job description:
TEKsystems has partnered with a client in RTP who is seeking an entry level data analyst with 0-3 years of experience for a long term contract opportunity. This individual will be responsible for customer validation, hierarchy setups, and demographic validation. They will be handling electronic requests and determining whether or not to accept/deny customer updates. This customer is in the process of bringing data in-house which has created 10,000+ additional customers and means that they must retroactively go back to validate these customers in the system, which is all Excel spread sheet driven.

About TEKsystems:

We're partners in transformation. We help clients activate ideas and solutions to take advantage of a new world of opportunity. We are a team of 80,000 strong, working with over 6,000 clients, including 80% of the Fortune 500, across North America, Europe and Asia. As an industry leader in Full-Stack Technology Services, Talent Services, and real-world application, we work with progressive leaders to drive change. That's the power of true partnership. TEKsystems is an Allegis Group company.
